title: "Cedar Rapids travelers seem OK with new facial recognition checks"
excerpt: "Mandi Tieskoetter of Cedar Rapids waits for her flight to California on Aug. 4 at The Eastern Iowa Airport in Cedar Rapids. She said she has no objection to the new facial recognition scans being tested at the airport “if it makes things more efficient … and helps them be sure who we really are.” (Jim Slosiarek/The Gazette)"
